programme.title: Acts of Violence
programme.desc: A man teams up with his ex-military brothers and a detective to save his kidnapped fiancee from human traffickers.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).

programme.title: Donnie Darko: The Director's Cut
programme.desc: An unusual teenager (Jake Gyllenhaal) follows the instructions of the 6-foot-tall rabbit which saved his life.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A death-row inmate from a Central American jail is among the prisoners taken to a remote island for a to-the-death match broadcast live over the Internet.

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A former bounty hunter (Randy Orton) lands in a tournament where convicts fight to the death for an online audience.

programme.title: The Director's Chair
programme.desc: Robert and George Miller discuss Miller's career as director, writer and producer, including a special section on "Mad Max: Fury Road."

programme.title: El Rey Nation
programme.desc: The resident nerds break down all things pop culture with the Lightning Round before the Fight Board is unveiled in a segment filled with flying darts and death-defying debates.

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: A vacation in Spain turns nightmarish when a man's (Henry Cavill) family is kidnapped by agents who are hell-bent on recovering a mysterious briefcase.

programme.title: I Am Wrath
programme.desc: A man sets out to get his own justice after police are unable to catch his wife's killer.

programme.title: Studio 666
programme.desc: Legendary rock band Foo Fighters move into an Encino mansion steeped in grisly rock and roll history to record their much anticipated 10th album.

programme.title: Romeo Is Bleeding
programme.desc: A double life catches up to a New York policeman (Gary Oldman) when he meets a mob hit-woman (Lena Olin) from Moscow.

programme.title: Speed Kills
programme.desc: A wealthy speedboat racer leads a double life that gets him into trouble with the law and drug lords.

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A fallen swordsman (Clive Owen) leads a small army against a sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master (Morgan Freeman).

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).

programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: A discredited former cop connects a murder case to an elaborate conspiracy involving high-stakes treason.
